dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, big news from Kazhydromet for the next few days, B.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, big news from Kazhydromet for the next few days, B.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What's the scoop? Like, more sun or... [laughs]
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What's the scoop? Like, more sun or...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Nah, actually, they're saying pretty unstable weather is, uh, headed our way for June 26th, 27th, and 28th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nah, actually, they're saying pretty unstable weather is, uh, headed our way for June twenty sixth, twenty seventh, and twenty eighth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet meteorologists have announced the weather forecast for June 26, 27, and 28. A northwestern cyclone is moving into Kazakhstan, causing unstable weather conditions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unstable? What does that even mean? Like, just a little rain?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unstable? What does that even mean? Like, just a little rain?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's a northwestern cyclone moving in, so, expect rain, thunderstorms, and some pretty strong winds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's a northwestern cyclone moving in, so, expect rain, thunderstorms, and some pretty strong winds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A northwestern cyclone is moving into Kazakhstan, causing unstable weather conditions. Over the next three days, rain, thunderstorms, and strong winds are expected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Strong winds, huh? For the whole country, or... [interrupts]
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Strong winds, huh? For the whole country, or...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, not everywhere. They're forecasting heavy precipitation, like, in the western, northwestern, eastern, and central regions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, not everywhere. They're forecasting heavy precipitation, like, in the western, northwestern, eastern, and central regions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to meteorologists, heavy precipitation is forecast in certain areas of the western, northwestern, eastern, and central regions, with possible hail and squally wind gusts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow. Heavy rain, so... possible flooding, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow. Heavy rain, so... possible flooding, I guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and get this: possible hail and even squally wind gusts in those areas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and get this: possible hail and even squally wind gusts in those areas.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to meteorologists, heavy precipitation is forecast in certain areas of the western, northwestern, eastern, and central regions, with possible hail and squally wind gusts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, hail! That's, uh, that's a lot going on for just a few days. But what about temperatures?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, hail! That's, uh, that's a lot going on for just a few days. But what about temperatures?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Interestingly, despite all that thunderstorm activity, no *significant* temperature fluctuations are expected across most of the country.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Interestingly, despite all that thunderstorm activity, no significant temperature fluctuations are expected across most of the country.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Despite the thunderstorm activity, no significant temperature fluctuations are expected across most of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Really? So it won't get super cold, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Really? So it won't get super cold, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nah, during the day, western, northern, and eastern regions will be around +18 to +28 degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nah, during the day, western, northern, and eastern regions will be around plus eighteen to plus twenty eight degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the day, temperatures will rise to +18¦+28ÂC in the western, northern, and eastern regions

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Okay, so pretty mild there. But what about the south, uh, the hotter spots?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so pretty mild there. But what about the south, uh, the hotter spots?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, the south and southeast, they're gonna stay pretty hot, like, +28 to +38 degrees.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, the south and southeast, they're gonna stay pretty hot, like, plus twenty eight to plus thirty eight degrees.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: while the south and southeast will remain hot with highs of +28¦+38ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, unstable, rainy, some hail, but still pretty warm, especially down south. Got it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, unstable, rainy, some hail, but still pretty warm, especially down south. Got it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, basically. Keep an umbrella handy, but maybe not a heavy coat!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, basically. Keep an umbrella handy, but maybe not a heavy coat!
